name: Enchanted Garden
description:
Enchanted Garden Wireframes

Enchanted Garden is a mobile game with ranked pvp matches, in which each player plants flowers on her own tiled field in order to grow bases that generate effects and allow her to attack the field of her opponent, eventually wiping them out completely. The nature of the matches is to scale greatly in intensity the later they go, like how players grow their collection of flowers and skins available for use the more they play and level up.

Please watch the walkthrough video to learn more about Enchanted Garden, and if you're really enthusiastic, feel free to download our game design document!

PLEASE BE AWARE: Enchanted Garden is a wireframed, designed game that has not been developed; that is to say, it's not playable. THE WIREFRAME LINK ABOVE will take you to an interactive representation of it where you can explore what Enchanted Garden would look like on several screens, "play" through some of a mock match and "purchase" a flower in the shop!

Designed by Thia Broido (formerly Sabrina) and James Kaplan in January & February 2022; Wireframes by Thia
